title: Isuan naupangte a hmangaih
lyrics:
Isuan naupangte a hmangaih,
Thinlung hmangaihin a khat;
Chhun leh zanin a veng fo va,
A lalthutthleng a tang chuan.

Isuan min hmangaih ka hria a,
Amaha ta chauh ka ni a;
Isuan min hmangaih ka lawm a,
Amahin min tlan a ni.

Eng nge ka hlim chhan mi zawh chuan,
Krista ka tana thi chu;
Tin, Baibulin min hrilh bawk a,
"Naupangte lo kal rawh u."

Isuan naupang dilnaa hria,
A lalthuthleng atang chuan;
Lo kal rawh u, i fak ang u,
Vanram phaiphulengte nen.
